con:part.con:content: <definitions targetNamespace="ld:logical/PlanoCredito/Plano_ws" name="Plano" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="ld:logical/PlanoCredito/Plano_ws" namespace="http://www.vivo.com.br/nfo/catalogoPRS"/> <xs:element name="buscarPlano"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="paramXML"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="dsns0:ParamBuscarPlano"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="buscarPlanoResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="dsns0:ListaPlanos" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.vivo.com.br/nfo/catalogoPRS" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:pag="http://www.vivo.com.br/SN/CatalogoPlano" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.vivo.com.br/SN/CatalogoPlano"/> <xsd:element name="ListaPlanos"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Plano" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="idPlano" type="xsd:long"/> <xsd:element name="cdPlano" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="cdPlanoMaster" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="nmPlano" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="vlAssinatura" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="qtdFranquia" type="xsd:long" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="dsDescricao" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="statusPlano" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="cdAnatel" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="indPlanoTitDep"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="T"/> <xsd:enumeration value="D"/> <xsd:enumeration value="A"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="qtdPlanoDep" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="cdPlanoTitDepRel" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="indAprovisiona" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="S"/> <xsd:enumeration value="N"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="idSistema" type="xsd:long"/> <xsd:element name="inStatusAnaliseCredito" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"> <xsd:enumeration value="1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="2"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="nmTipoPlano" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="sgTipoPlano" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="rede4G" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:element name="PaginacaoOut"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="paginaAtual" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="totalRegistros" targetNamespace="http://www.vivo.com.br/nfo/catalogoPRS" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:element name="RetornoPlano"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="idPlano" type="xsd:long" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="cdAnatel" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="PerfilAcesso"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="idPerfilSCA" type="xsd:long" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="idSistema" type="xsd:long" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence>
